name: Zespri Kiwi - Green
description: Green Kiwifruit has a tangier, tarter flavor. It flesh is bright green, with an edible white to pale green center and tiny black seeds. It contains the potassium of a banana, the vitamin C of two oranges and a large amount fiber as lots of whole grain cereals.

name: Fresho Apple - Washington
description: Washington Apples are a normal resource of fiber and are fat free. They have cherry to dark red color with red streaks and sometimes have a speckled pattern on its smooth skin. They have anti-oxidants and polynutrients. The apples hold 95 calories. These Washington Apples are crusty, crimson, smooth-skinned, luscious fruits. Washington apples are a natural source of fibre and are fat free. They contain anti-oxidants and polynutrients. Calories = 95 These apples help reduce cholesterol levels and prevent 'heart disease', 'smoker's risk' and aid \`'lung functions'."
